document_data.name: On Four Feet
document_data.mainbody: '''On Four Feet''' was a barn located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The barn was located in south Zhentil Keep in the western section of the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] in between [[Teshwave Street]] and [[Center Street]].
document_data.Activities: The barn housed a number of livestock, and customers could use the structure as a stable for their [[horse]]s or other animals as well. The rates were 10 [[gp]] per night for regular mounts and 25 gp for exotic mounts. These prices included grooming and feeding.
document_data.Inhabitants: On Four Feet was owned by a man named [[Balrud Thal]] in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}.
